step1.title: Stay Connected, Always
step1.description: Send loving messages to your children in their language, even when you're apart. Distance doesn't diminish love.
step1.languageHint: The language you'll use to write messages.

step2.title: Messages That Matter
step2.description: Pre-written loving messages, personalized with names, and automatically translated with care. Ready to share instantly.

step3.title: Private and Secure
step3.description: No tracking, no external services by default. Your family's messages stay on your device, for your eyes only.

step4.title: Add Your First Child
step4.description: Let's create a profile for them. You can add more children later.

step5.title: Their Language
step5.description: The language your child speaks and understands.

step6.title: Translation Service
step6.description: Optional: Enable automatic translation with your own DeepL API key. We selected DeepL for its best-in-class quality and maximum data security.
step6.apiKeyHelp: Creating a free account is straightforward and helps bridge the communication gap. Get your free key from DeepL (500,000 characters/month free). By using your key, you agree to DeepL's terms and are responsible for its usage.

step7.title: You're All Set!
step7.description: Your family messaging app is ready. You can add more children and customize messages anytime.
